column1: Little Goat Diner////My friend took me here for my birthday and it was delicious! The shrimp app was a little odd for my taste
column2: but it wasn't bad. The curry mayo was my favorite
column3: oddly enough. What really made the experience was the server
column5: sorry). She was attentive and genuine. I didn't feel like she was fishing for tips
column6: but she was definitely going above and beyond to make sure we left happy. And
column8: thanks for the experience and the awesome service!
